step_feedback.feedback: Good job clasping your hands in your lap. Keep your elbows relatively close together as you begin to lift them.
You're doing well lifting your hands towards your forehead. Focus on keeping your elbows close to your head as you move them behind you.
Excellent job spreading your elbows wide behind your head. This is a key part of the stretch.
You held the position well. Remember to keep your head upright and avoid pulling forward.
Great job reversing the motion and returning to the starting position. You're completing the exercise smoothly.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Remember to keep your elbows close as you lift and spread them wide behind your head. This helps improve shoulder flexibility and lymph flow.
